Name: Springtide Storm
Effect: Area Move. Lethal. Low Accuracy 2. *Choose one: Roll 3 Chance Dice to increase by 1 the User's Strength, Special, Dexterity, Defense & Sp. Defense. Or, Roll 3 Chance dice to Reduce by 2 the affected Defense & Sp. Defense.
Description: The whole battlefield becomes engulfed in a maelstrom of emotion. Love and hate deal emotional damage to those unfortunate enough to be trapped into it.
